anger	anger, anger, exasperation
disgust	disgust, distaste, make someone feel abhorred
fear	fear, phobia, uneasiness
guilt	guilt, blameworthiness, self-reprimand
joy	joy, cheerfulness, happiness
love	love, love, romance
sadness	sadness, mourn, sadness
shame	shame, self-mortification, self-condemnation
surprise	surprise, astonishment, amazement
noemo	no emotion, unfeelingness, indifference
